p:
Three physical properties were determined: refractive index ( n = 1.499 ± 0.002), relative density ( d = 0.906 ± 0.012 g.m/L), and optical rotation (

= − 7.50 ± 0.98
in CHCl 3, c = 10.0). In this context, some authors state that the physical properties are determined by the genetic characteristics, geographical location, and phenological stages of the plant [ 16, 17].
